title: E11even alloy and carbon gravel wheels positioned as durable upgrade to OEM spec
content:
E11even have released a new line of carbon and (affordable) alloy gravel wheelsets accommodating tires from 28c right up to 50c. With a reliable, durable, serviceable DT SWISS 370 hubset and 24 spokes front and rear, these new gravel wheels are positioned as reasonably priced upgrades to OEM Spec gravel bikes.  E11even Gravel Wheels The […]

The post E11even alloy and carbon gravel wheels positioned as durable upgrade to OEM spec appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
